pr_title: Fix cancel button in Edit features with feature-linked annotation

timeline.body: Perhaps it's possible to return `false` here. That way we can convert the type `Optional<Boolean>` to just `Boolean`.
timeline.bodyText: Perhaps it's possible to return false here. That way we can convert the type Optional<Boolean> to just Boolean.
timeline.bodyHTML: Perhaps it's possible to return false here. That way we can convert the type Optional<Boolean> to just Boolean.
timeline.author: JonLavi

replies.bodyText: Dialog.showAndWait() returns an Optional, so I don't think I can use a Boolean.
replies.author: sclaridge

timeline.body:
If the suggestion of returning just a `Boolean` from the dialog works, we can write here:
```suggestion
      if (updatingFeature) {
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
If the suggestion of returning just a Boolean from the dialog works, we can write here:

Suggested change
if (updatingFeature.isPresent()) {
if (updatingFeature) {
timeline.author: JonLavi
